amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Pakistan by $600 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 113-170 to cut funding to Pakistan by $600 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 237 (Roll no. 386).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
